posts.post_content:
Hello fellow Net54'ers:

FS: Empty Sweet Caporal Box.

1902 dated Tax Stamp therefore would not have included a T206 card but it is the same size and style in which the cards were later packed (see display below).

Factory No. 25. 2d Dist. of Virginia.

The box is completely intact but does have a tear along the front seam on the left side which goes about halfway down. 

I've seen prices all over the place on these boxes so PM me with your offers and we'll talk. 

Cobbies not for sale.

Paypal, check, m/o all OK.

Christopher.

[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/hwa3oy.jpg[/IMG]
A pretty clean, but possibly not as old SC box sold on eBay last night for $33
